scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && make dev" "npm run client"
scripts.server: cd server && npx kill-port 5000 && make dev
scripts.client: cd client && npx kill-port 3000 && npm run dev
scripts.fix-codemirror: cd client && rm -rf node_modules && npm uninstall @codemirror/basic-setup @codemirror/commands && npm install codemirror@latest && npm install
